languages.text: "Я радуюсь, видя, как посеянные мной жемчужины благоразумия прорастают древами верных решений. Шерин, я ожидаю, что ты будешь готова в любой момент предстать передо мной для получения инструкций. Вольного Торговца я же благодарю особо — не каждый день Император дарует право наблюдать воистину мудр{mf|ого|ую} вершител{mf|я|ьницу} судеб, знающ{mf|его|ую}, что превыше всех благодатей для человека стоит заведение друзей, а не врагов".

"I rejoice to see the pearls of wisdom I have sown grow into trees of sound decisions. Shereen, I expect you to be ready to appear before me at any time to receive instructions. I offer my particular thanks to the Rogue Trader — it's not every day that the Emperor grants the chance to observe a truly wise {mf|master|mistress} of destinies who knows that the pinnacle of all Humanity's graces is the making of friends, not the making of enemies."
languages.original_text: "Я радуюсь, видя, как посеянные мной жемчужины благоразумия прорастают древами верных решений. Шерин, я ожидаю, что ты будешь готова в любой момент предстать передо мной для получения инструкций. Вольного Торговца я же благодарю особо — не каждый день Император дарует право наблюдать воистину мудр{mf|ого|ую} вершител{mf|я|ьницу} судеб, знающ{mf|его|ую}, что превыше всех благодатей для человека стоит заведение друзей, а не врагов".

languages.text: “我很高兴看到，我曾播撒下的智慧之种长成了大树，如今已经可以做出正确的决定。我希望你随时都能准备好出现在我面前，接受我给你的指示，亲爱的。而且，我尤其要感谢行商浪人。毕竟，帝皇并非每天都能赐予我这样的礼物，让我亲眼看到真正睿智之人会如何行事。{mf|他|她}很清楚，人类万千美德的典范，都在于结交朋友，而非四处树敌。”
languages.original_text: "I rejoice to see the pearls of wisdom I have sown grow into trees of sound decisions. Shereen, I expect you to be ready to appear before me at any time to receive instructions. I offer my particular thanks to the Rogue Trader — it's not every day that the Emperor grants the chance to observe a truly wise {mf|master|mistress} of destinies who knows that the pinnacle of all Humanity's graces is the making of friends, not the making of enemies."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴看到，我曾播撒下的智慧之种长成了大树，如今已经可以做出正确的决定。我希望你随时都能准备好出现在我面前，接受我给你的指示，亲爱的。而且，我尤其要感谢行商浪人。毕竟，帝皇并非每天都能赐予我这样的礼物，让我亲眼看到真正睿智之人会如何行事。{mf|他|她}很清楚，人类万千美德的典范，都在于结交朋友，而非四处树敌。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「私が蒔いた知恵の真珠が、的確な決断を下す木に育つのを見るのは喜ばしいことだ。シェリーン、いつでも私の前に現れ、指示を受けられるようにしておくように。ローグトレーダーには特に感謝の意を表しましょう。人類の栄誉の頂点は、敵を作ることではなく、友人を作ることであると知っている、真に賢明な運命の陛下を観察する機会を皇帝が与えてくれることは、そうあることではありませんからな」
languages.original_text: "I rejoice to see the pearls of wisdom I have sown grow into trees of sound decisions. Shereen, I expect you to be ready to appear before me at any time to receive instructions. I offer my particular thanks to the Rogue Trader — it's not every day that the Emperor grants the chance to observe a truly wise {mf|master|mistress} of destinies who knows that the pinnacle of all Humanity's graces is the making of friends, not the making of enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「私が蒔いた知恵の真珠が、的確な決断を下す木に育つのを見るのは喜ばしいことだ。シェリーン、いつでも私の前に現れ、指示を受けられるようにしておくように。ローグトレーダーには特に感謝の意を表しましょう。人類の栄誉の頂点は、敵を作ることではなく、友人を作ることであると知っている、真に賢明な運命の陛下を観察する機会を皇帝が与えてくれることは、そうあることではありませんからな」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «Me complace ver que las perlas de sabiduría que sembré se han convertido en árboles de firme decisión. Shereen, espero que acudas rauda a mi llamada cuando tenga instrucciones para ti. En cuanto a usted, Comerciante Independiente, le doy mi más sincero agradecimiento. No todos los días el Emperador concede la oportunidad de ver a {mf|un ilustre maestro|una ilustre maestra} del destino que sabe que la gracia suma de la humanidad es trabar amistades, no enemistades».
languages.original_text: "I rejoice to see the pearls of wisdom I have sown grow into trees of sound decisions. Shereen, I expect you to be ready to appear before me at any time to receive instructions. I offer my particular thanks to the Rogue Trader — it's not every day that the Emperor grants the chance to observe a truly wise {mf|master|mistress} of destinies who knows that the pinnacle of all Humanity's graces is the making of friends, not the making of enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Me complace ver que las perlas de sabiduría que sembré se han convertido en árboles de firme decisión. Shereen, espero que acudas rauda a mi llamada cuando tenga instrucciones para ti. En cuanto a usted, Comerciante Independiente, le doy mi más sincero agradecimiento. No todos los días el Emperador concede la oportunidad de ver a {mf|un ilustre maestro|una ilustre maestra} del destino que sabe que la gracia suma de la humanidad es trabar amistades, no enemistades».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Je suis ravi de constater que les perles de sagesse que j'avais plantées se sont transformées en arbres de décisions avisées. Shereen, je te demanderai de te tenir prête à te présenter devant moi à tout moment pour recevoir mes instructions. Je remercie aussi chaleureusement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Il est rare que l'Empereur nous offre une occasion d'observer à l'ouvrage {mf|un maître clairvoyant|une maîtresse clairvoyante} des destinées qui sait que les grâces de l'humanité tiennent avant tout au nombre de ses amis, plutôt qu'à celui de ses ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "I rejoice to see the pearls of wisdom I have sown grow into trees of sound decisions. Shereen, I expect you to be ready to appear before me at any time to receive instructions. I offer my particular thanks to the Rogue Trader — it's not every day that the Emperor grants the chance to observe a truly wise {mf|master|mistress} of destinies who knows that the pinnacle of all Humanity's graces is the making of friends, not the making of enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi de constater que les perles de sagesse que j'avais plantées se sont transformées en arbres de décisions avisées. Shereen, je te demanderai de te tenir prête à te présenter devant moi à tout moment pour recevoir mes instructions. Je remercie aussi chaleureusement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Il est rare que l'Empereur nous offre une occasion d'observer à l'ouvrage {mf|un maître clairvoyant|une maîtresse clairvoyante} des destinées qui sait que les grâces de l'humanité tiennent avant tout au nombre de ses amis, plutôt qu'à celui de ses ennemis. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Es erfreut mich zu sehen, wie die Perlen der Weisheit, die ich gesät habe, zu Bäumen mit vernünftigen Entscheidungen herangewachsen sind. Shereen, ich erwarte von Euch, dass Ihr jederzeit bereit seid, hier zu erscheinen, um meine Anweisungen entgegenzunehmen. Mein besonderer Dank gilt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} – es kommt nicht jeden Tag vor, dass der Imperator einem die Möglichkeit verschafft, {mf|einen wahrhaften Herr|eine wahrhafte Herrin} der Schicksale zu treffen, {mf|der|die} ganz genau weiß, dass die besondere Kraft der Menschheit darin besteht, sich Freunde zu machen, nicht Feinde."
languages.original_text: "I rejoice to see the pearls of wisdom I have sown grow into trees of sound decisions. Shereen, I expect you to be ready to appear before me at any time to receive instructions. I offer my particular thanks to the Rogue Trader — it's not every day that the Emperor grants the chance to observe a truly wise {mf|master|mistress} of destinies who knows that the pinnacle of all Humanity's graces is the making of friends, not the making of enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Es erfreut mich zu sehen, wie die Perlen der Weisheit, die ich gesät habe, zu Bäumen mit vernünftigen Entscheidungen herangewachsen sind. Shereen, ich erwarte von Euch, dass Ihr jederzeit bereit seid, hier zu erscheinen, um meine Anweisungen entgegenzunehmen. Mein besonderer Dank gilt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} – es kommt nicht jeden Tag vor, dass der Imperator einem die Möglichkeit verschafft, {mf|einen wahrhaften Herr|eine wahrhafte Herrin} der Schicksale zu treffen, {mf|der|die} ganz genau weiß, dass die besondere Kraft der Menschheit darin besteht, sich Freunde zu machen, nicht Feinde."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Ektiğim bilgelik incilerinin büyüyüp mantıklı karar ağaçlarına dönüşmüş olduğunu görmek mutluluk verici. Şirinim, alacağın talimatları beklemek üzere her daim gözümün önünde hazır olmanı istiyorum. Hür Tacir'e özellikle teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum. İmparator; İnsanlığın en muazzam faziletinin düşman kazanmak değil de dost kazanmak olduğunu bilen, gerçekten bilge bir hükümdar görme fırsatını her gün bahşetmiyor."
languages.original_text: "I rejoice to see the pearls of wisdom I have sown grow into trees of sound decisions. Shereen, I expect you to be ready to appear before me at any time to receive instructions. I offer my particular thanks to the Rogue Trader — it's not every day that the Emperor grants the chance to observe a truly wise {mf|master|mistress} of destinies who knows that the pinnacle of all Humanity's graces is the making of friends, not the making of enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Ektiğim bilgelik incilerinin büyüyüp mantıklı karar ağaçlarına dönüşmüş olduğunu görmek mutluluk verici. Şirinim, alacağın talimatları beklemek üzere her daim gözümün önünde hazır olmanı istiyorum. Hür Tacir'e özellikle teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum. İmparator, İnsanlığın en muazzam faziletinin düşman kazanmak değil de dost kazanmak olduğunu bilen, gerçekten bilge bir hükümdara şahit olma fırsatını her gün bahşetmiyor."
traits.speaker: Mercy
